query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE, COLUMN_DEFAULT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'room_types' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4C7dh5n6yXuaUbo.root --database Un9ncnuBxgCCtamkr3qHdr --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE, COLUMN_DEFAULT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'room_types' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE() ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	COLUMN_TYPE	IS_NULLABLE	COLUMN_DEFAULT
id	int(11)	NO	NULL
name	varchar(100)	NO	NULL
nameEn	varchar(100)	YES	NULL
description	text	NO	NULL
descriptionEn	text	YES	NULL
size	varchar(50)	YES	NULL
capacity	int(11)	NO	2
price	decimal(10,2)	NO	NULL
weekendPrice	decimal(10,2)	YES	NULL
images	longtext	YES	NULL
amenities	text	YES	NULL
isAvailable	tinyint(1)	NO	1
display_order	int(11)	NO	0
createdAt	timestamp	NO	CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
updatedAt	timestamp	NO	CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
maxSalesQuantity	int(11)	NO	10
